topic.title: Using the Management Console to manage process instances

body.p: You can use the Management Console to view and manage process instance details from your BAMOE services. You can run the Management Console for local BAMOE services or add it to your BAMOE infrastructure on OpenShift.

ul.li: A BAMOE Data Index Service instance is configured and running for your BAMOE service. The Data Index Service enables the Management Console to access stored process data. The Data Index Service requires Infinispan or MongoDB persistence and Apache Kafka messaging for your BAMOE service.

li.p: The pom.xml file of your BAMOE project contains the following dependency for the process management add-on. This add-on enables the Management Console to interact with the process data through the add-on REST endpoint /management/processes.
